In England, in the seven days to 09 September, there were 181,776 new confirmed cases (321.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 September, there were 179,752 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 1% (2,024 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 September is 6,237,505 (11,030 cases per 100,000 population).
